title: Dynamic Memory Management for Large Datasets
summary: Introduces dynamic memory allocation strategies to efficiently handle large datasets and improve performance.

title: Cache Invalidation Bug
summary: Improper cache invalidation leads to stale data being served, affecting real-time data accuracy.

title: Stale Data Served Due to Cache Invalidation Bug
summary: Improper cache invalidation results in outdated data being served, affecting data consistency and reliability.
